name: spark
description: Spark is a fast and general cluster computing system for Big Data
preInstallNotes: We recommend a minimum of two nodes with at least 2 CPU and 2GB of RAM available for the Spark Service and running a Spark job. Also the Spark client might take up to a few minutes to download
postInstallNotes:
Spark DCOS Service has been successfully installed!
Note that the service is beta and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
We recommend a minimum of one node with at least 1 CPU and 2GB of RAM available for use by the Spark Service.

	Documentation: https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/running-on-mesos.html
	Issues: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK
